title: Digital Competency Development for Healthcare Professionals: Simulation/VR-Based MOOC

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Knowledge and Experience with Digital Tools
context.additional_context: Customized Course for Graduate Medical Professionals to Enhance Digital Competencies in VR/Simulation Environments

learning_goals: Learners can design virtual patient management simulations using digital tools (metaverse/VR) suitable for medical education scenarios
Learners can produce digital educational materials incorporating real-time peer feedback using online collaboration tools
Learners can develop and effectively present digital education modules applicable to real medical education environments through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
